page.title: 07TONMAWR - AMENITIES
page.content: Although just outside the block the community of Danycoed contains some of the amenities most regularly used by the villagers. The village shop is there - a tiny building with only the most basic of stock.{The Rugby Club}is in Danycoed, as is the{Pelenna {Community Centre}. This last is used as a doctors' surgery, as a clinic, for bingo, discos and any village function . In Tonmawr proper is the{Post Office, which also has a minimal stock of other items.. a cigarette machine, sweets crisps and bread are more or less all it sells. A small children's play area (a swing and a see-saw) is available in Tonmawr, while in Danycoed is a large adventure playground. A small corrugated steel chapel -{The Mission}stands at one end of the village. (see page 9)
